ingredients.ingredient: 4 tablespoons Bloody Mary dry spice mix (such as Lucille's®), divided
1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
3 scallions, cut into 1-inch pieces, or more to taste
32 colossal shrimp, shelled and deveined with tail on

cookingTips: Sauté shrimp briefly (2-3 minutes per side) to prevent rubbery texture; they continue cooking in the sauce
Colossal shrimp are large and cook quickly; watch carefully to avoid overcooking
Add the tomato juice mixture near the end so flavors stay bright and the shrimp remains tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook master shrimp timing, balance the savory Bloody Mary spices, and achieve restaurant-quality results.
